io.github.ascopes.jct.diagnostics

Packages that use io.github.ascopes.jct.diagnostics
Package
Description
io.github.ascopes.jct.assertions
Assertions to perform on the result of a compilation.
io.github.ascopes.jct.compilers
Compiler frontends that allow invoking compilers easily from tests.
io.github.ascopes.jct.compilers.impl
Implementation details for compiler integrations.
io.github.ascopes.jct.diagnostics
Support for collecting and representing diagnostics from compiler implementations.
  • Classes in io.github.ascopes.jct.diagnostics used by io.github.ascopes.jct.assertions
    Class
    Description
    TraceDiagnostic
    A wrapper around a Diagnostic which contains additional information about where the diagnostic was reported.
  • Classes in io.github.ascopes.jct.diagnostics used by io.github.ascopes.jct.compilers
    Class
    Description
    TeeWriter
    A writer that wraps an output stream and also writes any content to an in-memory buffer.
    TraceDiagnostic
    A wrapper around a Diagnostic which contains additional information about where the diagnostic was reported.
    TracingDiagnosticListener
    A diagnostics listener that wraps all diagnostics in additional invocation information, and then stores them in a queue for processing later.
